attributes.action: Regulate 'ritual slaughter'  (bleeding animals to death).Ensure animals are treated humanely.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Regulate 'ritual slaughter'where animals are bled to death.
Assure that animals are treated humanely before and during death.
